pullRequest.title: Extend ST_Points to support major Well-Known spatial objects
pullRequest.bodyText:
Extend ST_Points to support POINT, LINESTRING, POLYGON, MULTIPOINT,
MULTILINESTRING, MULTIPOLYGON and GEOMETRYCOLLECTION.

nodes.bodyText:
We generally place arguments either all on the same line or all in separate lines. In this case, I'd put all the enum values on the same line.
Also, let's make it a private static final constant to avoid creating the enum set in every call.

commit.message:
Extend ST_Points to support major Well-Known spatial objects

Extend ST_Points to support POINT, LINESTRING, POLYGON, MULTIPOINT,
MULTILINESTRING, MULTIPOLYGON and GEOMETRYCOLLECTION.
